thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 9 of 122
thread.title: Priya P

author: Priya P
title: Priya P
text:
I've used Dialaflight a few times over the years, but this was my longest trip with them.
Clinton helped me book a 2 week trip to Thailand for a group of 8. He was excellent with recommendations and very quick with communication. I would thoroughly recommend him for any holiday needs!
We had three parts of the trip with internal flights etc...so using a trusty agent was well worth it for the piece of mind. They even helped sort a small problem with my meal requests whilst I was in Thailand...this was above and beyond!
I will be booking again for sure!
